name: If you can’t score a TD from the 2, you don’t deserve to win. Especially in the playoffs. Sad for the Falcons, but it’s time to take a hard look at your offense. Underachieved all season. Finally bit you. Go Jaguars, I guess? 🏈

summary: To be fair they struggled last year with the Eagles when they had a high powered offense. They have had red zone issues all season along with other uncharacteristic problems that should not plague the talent they have. Maybe year two of Sark at OC and I'm by no means blaming him for the offensive woes as it's 99% execution but I think if they can upgrade the line (Guards!) and he can grow as an NFL signal caller then they can be right back in it to make a deep run.

summary: I’m not sold on Sark. But I don’t think he needs to be fired...... yet.

summary: Agreed, I was one of those blaming our early woes on him and I think he still carries some blame but we have to fix execution issues first. I think he got better as the season went on and started to learn how to use his weapons but he is still a ways off from what Shanny had last year but it did take Shanny 2 years so let's give Sark another year.
